headline: Jefferies starts coverage on Stanley Black & Decker with ‘buy,’ sees 20% upside
summary: Investing.com -- Jefferies initiated coverage on Stanley Black&Decker Inc (NYSE:SWK) with a 'buy' rating on around 20% upside potential as it highlighted momentum in the Dewalt brand, stabilization of Craftsman, and expected gross margin recapture in 2025 as key drivers of growth.
